name: Highway Warriors 2 (DEMO PHASE)
description:
Due to the invisible success of its predecessor, HW2 adds what is needed for a somewhat spoiled man's street racing game, including: Customizations,  World Exploration, Sandbox-style, Domestic Vehicles, Aesthetics, etc.

A final release of this game may drop sometime, not sure when. This description is even subject to change in the future.

Prequel: https://gamejolt.com/games/hw1/629445

Join the Discord server for updates: https://discord.gg/fbzMB5KPmN

Controls:
  • WASD/Arrow Keys = common sense
  • E/P = Shift Up
  • Q/L = Shift Down
  • LShift/K = Clutch
  • CTRL/Spacebar = Handbrake
  • R/T = Look Behind
  • RMB = Drag Camera (when in photo mode or customize mode)
Controls (Mouse Steering):
  • W = Clutch
  • E = Shift Up
  • Q = Shift Down
  • LShift = Handbrake
  • LMB = Gas
  • RMB = Brake
Split-Screen Multiplayer Controls: Player 1:
  • W = Gas
  • A = Left
  • D = Right
  • S = Brake/Reverse
  • E = Shift Up
  • Q = Shift Down
  • Z = Handbrake
  • X = Clutch
Player 2:
  • I = Gas
  • J = Left
  • L = Right
  • K = Brake/Reverse
  • O = Shift Up
  • U = Shift Down
  • M = Handbrake
  • < = Clutch

Tip:

There's a customization mode in this game. In order to drive your customized car - select Spec D in the car selection menu when starting a race.

Concerns:

Using keys to navigate through menus is buggy. Recommended to use mouse.

Some features are disabled in the Android version.
